7 Step Guide to ProcureSwift

Learn how to use ProcureSwfit in 7 simple steps.

Follow the steps below to buy any item of your desire and have it shipped from abroad to your doorstep without any hustle and bustle.

1. The Amazon Link

Copy item link. â€“ Visit the amazon website and search for whatever product that you want to buy and ship to Ghana via ProcureSwift.
Copy the item's link from your browser's address bar as seen in the image provided, then visit ProcureSwift to continue the process of buying with ProcureSwift.

Copy the link in the address bar

2. What to do with the Amazon link.

Paste the link â€“ Go to the ProcureSwift website homepage after you have acquired the amazon link of the item you want to buy.
Paste the link in the space provided in the home page of our website and then click the "Get Shipping Cost" button to continue.

Paste the link in the space provided and click on the button

3. Prices and Delivery Time

Check price and time of delivery â€“ Get to know how much the item you are purchasing will cost considering shipping costs, insurance fees and duty and also the estimated time it will take for your product to be delivered to you.
Click on the "Add to Cart" button once you are satisfied with the information provided to continue the purchasing process.

Read the costs and time of delivery of your product and click the button

4. Checking Out

Select the amount you want to buy â€“ Select the amount of the particular item you are buying and get to know how much it would cost in total for that number of items.
Once you are satisfied, click the "Check Out" button to continue with the purchasing process.

Select the number of the item you want to buy and check out.

5. Who and Where We're Delivering To.

Provide your delivery details â€“ Fill the forms provided with your delivery details so we know who and where we're delivering the product to.
Click on the "Save and Continue" button to continue the purchasing process.

Fill the forms and click on the button to save and continue

6. Making Payments

Summary â€“ Go over your delivery details, the number of items in your cart, your order summary and the estimated time of delivery and if everything is up to your liking,
Click the "Make Payment" button.

Go over your purchase one last time before clicking the button to making payment

7. Payment Methods

Pay via Mobile Money â€“ Select the method of payment for your product and proceed to pay for your product.

Select your method of payment and proceed to pay for your product.
